about_the_game:
Featuring immersive 3D manga panels, Sushi Ben is a VR narrative adventure game where you’ll save a beloved local sushi bar from some dastardly landsharks.

You will meet the colorful residents of Kotobuki Town who will introduce you to many activities as you get to know them.

Gain their friendship by completing tasks and they’ll accept an invitation to dine together to show support for the local sushi bar!

🖼️ 3D Manga Panels

A powerful visual storytelling tool unlike any VR game before that will make you feel like a manga protagonist!

🎣 Activities Galore

Go fishing, bug catching, and even dog walking – maybe even do a little ghost hunting on the side?


🕊️ Writing by Hatoful Boyfriend Creator

Unique characters are brought to life by the narrative talents of Moa – the creator of the critically acclaimed visual novel, Hatoful Boyfriend.

🎙️ Full Japanese Voice Acting

Characters are voiced by talented Japanese VAs such as Hideyuki Tanaka, Chiaki Takahashi, Mamiko Noto, Urara Takano, and Shintaro Asanuma.


🎵 Vibrant Music and Aesthetics

You’ll feel a nostalgic atmosphere and hear music that’ll take you to the heart of this charming seaside town as you explore and progress the story.

👥 Player Inclusive Experience

Change the skin tone of your in-game hands, switch the placement of your watch, and adapt locomotion options to fit your needs.

🪑 Comfortable Gameplay

Both seated and standing play options are available alongside room scaling.





Sushi Ben is a captivating VR narrative adventure with innovative technology, lively nostalgic graphics, heartfelt storytelling, and fun gameplay sure to capture any player.
